name: document_generation
description: Tools for generating professional documents on firm letterhead

tools.name: letterhead_generator
tools.description: Takes markdown content and generates a professional document on firm letterhead with optional PDF conversion

markdown_path.description: Path to markdown file (mutually exclusive with markdown_content)

markdown_content.description: Markdown string content (mutually exclusive with markdown_path)

output_path.description: Where to save the output .docx file

convert_to_pdf.description: Whether to also generate a PDF version

letterhead_template.description: Custom letterhead template path (uses firm default if not specified)

returns.errors: List of any errors or warnings

examples.description: Generate demand letter from markdown file
Generate letter from markdown string with custom replacements

supported_placeholders: Custom placeholders can be passed via replacements parameter
